pages.text: $(li)Mimicubes are creatures similar to slime that can be found guarding End Cities of the End.$(br)$(li)When attacked, they will mimic the weapons and armor of their attacker.$(br)$(li)That means they will can learn to use a shield, sword, bow, crossbow, trident, food and more.
Mimicubes may drop Mimicreams on death.
